Mojito.name: Mojito
Mojito.made_from: White Rum, Sugar, Lime Juice, Soda Water, Mint Leaves
Mojito.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum, top with soda water, and stir gently.

Negroni.name: Negroni
Negroni.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, and strain into a rocks glass with ice.

Rubicon.name: Rubicon
Rubicon.made_from: Gin, Campari, Lemon Juice, Passion Fruit Syrup
Rubicon.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with slapped mint.

Old Fashioned.name: Old Fashioned
Old Fashioned.made_from: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey, Sugar Cube, Angostura Bitters
Old Fashioned.instructions: Muddle sugar cube with bitters in a glass, add whiskey, and stir. Garnish with orange peel.

Martini.name: Martini
Martini.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a twist or olive.

Wet Martini.name: Wet Martini
Wet Martini.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a twist or olive.

Margarita.name: Margarita
Margarita.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with a salted rim.

Cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.made_from: Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice, Lime Juice
Cosmopolitan.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lime.

Daiquiri.name: Daiquiri
Daiquiri.made_from: White Rum, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup
Daiquiri.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
Daiquiri.personal_notes: A perfect balance of sweet and sour.

Whiskey Sour.name: Whiskey Sour
Whiskey Sour.made_from: Bourbon, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White
Whiskey Sour.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Garnish with a cherry or orange slice.
Whiskey Sour.personal_notes: The egg white adds a lovely foam.

Pina Colada.name: Pina Colada
Pina Colada.made_from: Malibu rum, Coconut Cream, Pineapple Juice
Pina Colada.instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

Bellini.name: Bellini
Bellini.instructions: Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine. Stir gently and pour into a chilled flute glass.

Black Russian.name: Black Russian
Black Russian.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Bloody Mary.name: Bloody Mary
Bloody Mary.made_from: Vodka, Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, Celery Salt, Pepper
Bloody Mary.instructions: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into a rocks glass.

Caipirinha.name: Caipirinha
Caipirinha.instructions: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

Champagne Cocktail.name: Champagne Cocktail
Champagne Cocktail.made_from: Chilled Champagne, Cognac, Angostura Bitters, Sugar Cube
Champagne Cocktail.instructions: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Pour gently chilled Champagne.

Corpse Reviver #2.name: Corpse Reviver #2
Corpse Reviver #2.made_from: Gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blonde, Lemon Juice, Absinthe
Corpse Reviver #2.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

French 75.name: French 75
French 75.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Sugar Syrup, Champagne
French 75.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except champagne, into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

Mai Tai.name: Mai Tai
Mai Tai.made_from: White Rum, Dark Rum, Orange Curacao, Lime Juice, Orgeat Syrup
Mai Tai.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass half filled with crushed ice.

Pisco Sour.name: Pisco Sour
Pisco Sour.made_from: Pisco, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White
Pisco Sour.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

Sazerac.name: Sazerac
Sazerac.made_from: Cognac, Absinthe, Sugar Cube, Peychaud's Bitters
Sazerac.instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. In a separate mixing glass, muddle the sugar cube with the bitters, add the cognac, and stir with ice. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

Sidecar.name: Sidecar
Sidecar.made_from: Cognac, Triple Sec, Fresh Lemon Juice
Sidecar.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Tom Collins.name: Tom Collins
Tom Collins.made_from: Old Tom Gin, Fresh Lemon Juice, Sugar Syrup, Soda Water
Tom Collins.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled Collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top up with soda water. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Vesper.name: Vesper
Vesper.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.made_from: White Rum, Golden Rum, Dark Rum, Apricot Brandy, Pineapple Juice, Fresh Lime Juice, Grenadine, Angostura Bitters
Zombie.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a large highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Boulevardier.name: Boulevardier
Boulevardier.made_from: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey, Campari, Sweet Vermouth
Boulevardier.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

French Martini.name: French Martini
French Martini.made_from: Vodka, Raspberry Liqueur, Fresh Pineapple Juice
French Martini.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a raspberry.

Hemingway Special.name: Hemingway Special
Hemingway Special.made_from: White Rum, Maraschino Liqueur, Fresh Grapefruit Juice, Fresh Lime Juice
Hemingway Special.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Singapore Sling.name: Singapore Sling
Singapore Sling.made_from: Gin, Cherry Liqueur, Cointreau, Benedictine, Pineapple Juice, Lime Juice, Grenadine, Angostura Bitters
Singapore Sling.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple slice and cherry.

Last Word.name: Last Word
Last Word.made_from: Gin, Green Chartreuse, Maraschino Liqueur, Fresh Lime Juice
Last Word.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Paper Plane.name: Paper Plane
Paper Plane.made_from: Bourbon Whiskey, Aperol, Amaro Nonino, Fresh Lemon Juice
Paper Plane.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Spicy Fifty.name: Spicy Fifty
Spicy Fifty.made_from: Vanilla Vodka, Elderflower Cordial, Fresh Lime Juice, Honey Syrup, Red Chili Pepper
Spicy Fifty.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake well and double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a red chili pepper.

Planter's Punch.name: Planter's Punch
Planter's Punch.made_from: Jamaican Rum, Fresh Lime Juice, Sugar Cane Juice
Planter's Punch.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass. Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

Long Island Iced Tea.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Long Island Iced Tea.made_from: Tequila, Vodka, White Rum, Cointreau, Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Cola
Long Island Iced Tea.instructions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.

Porn Star Martini.name: Porn Star Martini
ingredients: Half a Fresh Passion Fruit (for garnish)
Porn Star Martini.made_from: Vanilla Vodka, Passion Fruit Liqueur, Passion Fruit Purֳ©e, Vanilla Syrup, Fresh Lime Juice, Passion Fruit, Prosecco
Porn Star Martini.instructions: Add the vanilla vodka, passion fruit liqueur, passion fruit purֳ©e, vanilla syrup, and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well until the mixture is chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with half a passion fruit. Serve with a shot of prosecco on the side.

Gin Basil Smash.name: Gin Basil Smash
Gin Basil Smash.made_from: Gin, Fresh Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Fresh Basil Leaves
Gin Basil Smash.instructions: Muddle the basil leaves and simple syrup in a shaker to release the basil's aroma. Add the gin and fresh lemon juice. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a sprig of basil.

Naked and Famous.name: Naked and Famous
Naked and Famous.made_from: Mezcal, Aperol, Yellow Chartreuse, Fresh Lime Juice
Naked and Famous.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. No garnish is traditionally used.

Amaretto Sour.name: Amaretto Sour
Amaretto Sour.made_from: Amaretto, Fresh Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White, Angostura Bitters
Amaretto Sour.instructions: If using egg white, dry shake (shake without ice) the amaretto, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white to create froth. Add ice to the shaker and shake again until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry. Add a dash of Angostura bitters on top if desired.

Espresso Martini.name: Espresso Martini
Espresso Martini.made_from: Vodka, espresso, Coffee Liqueur, Simple Syrup
Espresso Martini.instructions: Add the vodka, freshly brewed espresso, coffee liqueur, and simple syrup into a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with three coffee beans.

Manhattan.name: Manhattan
Manhattan.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Sweet Vermouth, Angostura Bitters
Manhattan.instructions: Stir the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Manhattan.personal_notes: A classic cocktail that's both simple and elegant.

Mint Julep.name: Mint Julep
Mint Julep.instructions: Muddle the mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice, add bourbon, and stir well until the glass is frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Mint Julep.personal_notes: The traditional drink of the Kentucky Derby.

Brandy Alexander.name: Brandy Alexander
Brandy Alexander.made_from: Brandy, Crème de Cacao, Fresh Cream
Brandy Alexander.instructions: Shake the brandy, crème de cacao, and cream with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with grated nutmeg.
Brandy Alexander.personal_notes: A creamy and indulgent dessert cocktail.

Improved Whiskey Cocktail.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
Improved Whiskey Cocktail.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Maraschino Liqueur, Simple Syrup, Angostura Bitters, Absinthe
Improved Whiskey Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Improved Whiskey Cocktail.personal_notes: A refined version of the classic whiskey cocktail.

Gin Rickey.name: Gin Rickey
Gin Rickey.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add gin and lime juice, then top with club soda. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

Paloma.name: Paloma
Paloma.instructions: Rim a glass with salt (optional). Fill the glass with ice, add tequila and lime juice, then top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently and garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
Paloma.personal_notes: A popular Mexican cocktail that's both sweet and tangy.

Bee's Knees.name: Bee's Knees
Bee's Knees.instructions: Shake the gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.
Bee's Knees.personal_notes: A Prohibition-era cocktail that's simple yet delightful.

Monte Carlo.name: Monte Carlo
Monte Carlo.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Bénédictine Liqueur, Angostura Bitters
Monte Carlo.instructions: Stir the rye whiskey, Bénédictine, and bitters with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Monte Carlo.personal_notes: A smooth and herbal variation of the classic Manhattan.

Pink Lady.name: Pink Lady
Pink Lady.made_from: Gin, Applejack, Grenadine, Lemon Juice, Egg White
Pink Lady.instructions: Dry shake all ingredients without ice to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a cherry.
Pink Lady.personal_notes: A classic cocktail with a frothy texture and a balance of sweet and tart flavors.

Jack Rose.name: Jack Rose
Jack Rose.instructions: Shake the applejack, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Jack Rose.personal_notes: A fruity and slightly tart cocktail with a beautiful rose hue.

Mexican Firing Squad Special.name: Mexican Firing Squad Special
Mexican Firing Squad Special.made_from: Tequila, Lime Juice, Grenadine, Angostura Bitters, Soda Water
Mexican Firing Squad Special.instructions: Shake the tequila, lime juice, grenadine, and bitters with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a lime wheel.
Mexican Firing Squad Special.personal_notes: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail with a hint of spice.

Corpse Reviver No. 2.name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
Corpse Reviver No. 2.made_from: Gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, Lemon Juice, Absinthe
Corpse Reviver No. 2.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon peel.
Corpse Reviver No. 2.personal_notes: A well-balanced and aromatic cocktail traditionally enjoyed as a hangover cure.

Gimlet.name: Gimlet
Gimlet.instructions: Shake the gin and lime cordial with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass.
Gimlet.personal_notes: A simple and refreshing cocktail with a sweet-tart balance.

Martinez.name: Martinez
Martinez.made_from: Old Tom Gin, Sweet Vermouth, Maraschino Liqueur, Orange Bitters
Martinez.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Martinez.personal_notes: Considered a precursor to the Martini, offering a sweeter and more complex flavor profile.

Silver Fizz.name: Silver Fizz
Silver Fizz.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White, Soda Water
Silver Fizz.instructions: Dry shake the gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white without ice to emulsify. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a glass without ice and top with soda water.
Silver Fizz.personal_notes: A frothy and refreshing cocktail with a light, airy texture.

Daisy.name: Daisy
Daisy.made_from: Brandy, Yellow Chartreuse, Lemon Juice, Grenadine, Soda Water
Daisy.instructions: Shake the brandy, chartreuse, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a lemon wheel.
Daisy.personal_notes: A vibrant and slightly sweet cocktail with herbal undertones.

Jungle Bird.name: Jungle Bird
Jungle Bird.made_from: Dark Rum, Campari, Pineapple Juice, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup
Jungle Bird.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice and garnish with a pineapple wedge.
Jungle Bird.personal_notes: A tropical cocktail with a delightful balance of bitterness and sweetness.

Americano.name: Americano
Americano.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add Campari and sweet vermouth, then top with soda water. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.
Americano.personal_notes: A classic Italian aperitif that's both bitter and refreshing.

Bamboo.name: Bamboo
Bamboo.made_from: Dry Sherry, Dry Vermouth, Orange Bitters, Angostura Bitters
Bamboo.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Bamboo.personal_notes: A light and aromatic cocktail with a delicate balance of flavors.

Dark 'n Stormy.name: Dark 'n Stormy
Dark 'n Stormy.made_from: Dark Rum, Ginger Beer, Lime Juice
Dark 'n Stormy.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, pour in the dark rum and lime juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.
Dark 'n Stormy.personal_notes: A refreshing highball with a spicy kick, originating from Bermuda.

Whiskey Smash.name: Whiskey Smash
Whiskey Smash.made_from: Bourbon, Mint, Simple Syrup, Lemon Juice
Whiskey Smash.instructions: Muddle the mint leaves with simple syrup and lemon juice in a shaker. Add bourbon and ice, shake well, then strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Whiskey Smash.personal_notes: A citrusy and minty twist on the classic whiskey sour.

Gin Fizz.name: Gin Fizz
Gin Fizz.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Soda Water
Gin Fizz.instructions: Shake the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a glass without ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a lemon slice.
Gin Fizz.personal_notes: A classic effervescent cocktail with a tangy citrus flavor.

20th Century.name: 20th Century
20th Century.made_from: Gin, Lillet Blanc, White Crème de Cacao, Lemon Juice
20th Century.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
20th Century.personal_notes: A sophisticated cocktail named after the 20th Century Limited train, offering a harmonious blend of flavors.

Aviation.name: Aviation
Aviation.made_from: Gin, Maraschino Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Crème de Violette
Aviation.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a cherry.
Aviation.personal_notes: A floral and slightly tart cocktail with a distinctive pale blue hue.

Rye Buck.name: Rye Buck
Rye Buck.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Lemon Juice, Ginger Beer
Rye Buck.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add rye whiskey and lemon juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon wedge.
Rye Buck.personal_notes: A spicy and refreshing cocktail with the warmth of rye and the zing of ginger.

Moscow Mule.name: Moscow Mule
Moscow Mule.instructions: Fill a glass (traditionally a copper mug) with ice, add vodka and lime juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.
Moscow Mule.personal_notes: A classic cocktail known for its crisp and spicy flavor, often served in a copper mug.

Godfather.name: Godfather
Godfather.instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add Scotch whisky and amaretto. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Godfather.personal_notes: A simple yet elegant cocktail that balances the smoky notes of Scotch with the sweet, nutty flavor of amaretto.

Passion Fruit Margarita.name: Passion Fruit Margarita
Passion Fruit Margarita.made_from: Tequila, Passion Fruit Juice, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup
Passion Fruit Margarita.instructions: Rim a glass with salt and fill with ice. In a shaker, combine tequila, passion fruit juice, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into the prepared glass and garnish with a lime wheel.
Passion Fruit Margarita.personal_notes: A tropical twist on the classic margarita, offering a sweet and tangy flavor profile.

Between the Sheets.name: Between the Sheets
Between the Sheets.made_from: Cognac, Light Rum, Triple Sec, Fresh Lemon Juice
Between the Sheets.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Between the Sheets.personal_notes: A sophisticated and citrusy cocktail that's a variation of the classic Sidecar.

Hanky Panky.name: Hanky Panky
Hanky Panky.instructions: Stir gin, sweet vermouth, and Fernet-Branca with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.
Hanky Panky.personal_notes: A classic cocktail with a complex, bittersweet flavor profile.

Cheeky Vimto.name: Cheeky Vimto
Cheeky Vimto.instructions: Pour the port into a glass. Top up with Blue WKD. Stir gently to combine.
Cheeky Vimto.personal_notes: A sweet and fruity cocktail popular in the UK, reminiscent of the Vimto soft drink.

Poet's Dream.name: Poet's Dream
Poet's Dream.made_from: Gin, Dry Vermouth, Bénédictine, Orange Bitters
Poet's Dream.instructions: Stir gin, dry vermouth, Bénédictine, and orange bitters with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Poet's Dream.personal_notes: An elegant and aromatic cocktail with herbal and citrus notes.

Tokyo Iced Tea.name: Tokyo Iced Tea
Tokyo Iced Tea.made_from: Vodka, Light Rum, Gin, Tequila, Melon Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Lemon-Lime Soda
Tokyo Iced Tea.instructions: Combine vodka, light rum, gin, tequila, melon liqueur, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda and garnish with a lemon wedge.
Tokyo Iced Tea.personal_notes: A vibrant green twist on the Long Island Iced Tea, featuring melon liqueur for a fruity flavor.

Piña Colada.name: Piña Colada
Piña Colada.made_from: Light Rum, Pineapple Juice, Coconut Cream
Piña Colada.instructions: Combine light rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream in a blender with a scoop of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.
Piña Colada.personal_notes: A tropical classic that's creamy and refreshing, perfect for summer days.

French 125.name: French 125
French 125.made_from: Cognac, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Champagne
French 125.instructions: Combine cognac, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. Top with chilled champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.
French 125.personal_notes: A luxurious and effervescent cocktail, a variation of the classic French 75 using cognac.

Aperol Spritz.name: Aperol Spritz
Aperol Spritz.instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice cubes. Pour in the Aperol, followed by the Prosecco. Add a splash of soda water. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.
Aperol Spritz.personal_notes: A popular Italian aperitif that's light, refreshing, and perfect for warm evenings.

Shaft.name: Shaft
Shaft.made_from: Vodka, Coffee Liqueur, Espresso, Half-and-Half Cream
Shaft.instructions: Combine vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and half-and-half cream in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a few coffee beans.
Shaft.personal_notes: A creamy and caffeinated cocktail that's both energizing and indulgent.

El Presidente.name: El Presidente
El Presidente.made_from: White Rum, Dry Vermouth, Orange Curaçao, Grenadine
El Presidente.instructions: Combine white rum, dry vermouth, orange curaçao, and grenadine in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.
El Presidente.personal_notes: A Cuban classic that's elegant and slightly sweet, with a beautiful rosy hue.

Bramble.name: Bramble
ingredients: Fresh Blackberries and Lemon Slice (for garnish)
Bramble.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Crème de Mûre
Bramble.instructions: Combine gin, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the crème de mûre over the top. Garnish with fresh blackberries and a lemon slice.
Bramble.personal_notes: A modern classic that's both tart and sweet, showcasing the delightful flavor of blackberries.

Tommy's Margarita.name: Tommy's Margarita
Tommy's Margarita.instructions: Combine tequila, fresh lime juice, and agave syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wedge, if desired.
Tommy's Margarita.personal_notes: A modern twist on the classic Margarita, substituting agave syrup for triple sec to highlight the pure flavors of agave.

Batanga.name: Batanga
Batanga.instructions: Rim a tall glass with salt and fill with ice. Add tequila and freshly squeezed lime juice. Top with cola and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Batanga.personal_notes: A simple and refreshing Mexican cocktail, traditionally stirred with a knife for an authentic touch.

Mezcal Margarita.name: Mezcal Margarita
Mezcal Margarita.instructions: Rim a glass with salt and fill with ice. In a shaker, combine mezcal, fresh lime juice, and agave syrup with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into the prepared glass and garnish with a lime wheel.
Mezcal Margarita.personal_notes: A smoky variation of the classic Margarita, offering a complex and robust flavor profile.

White Negroni.name: White Negroni
White Negroni.instructions: Combine gin, Lillet Blanc, and Suze in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.
White Negroni.personal_notes: A contemporary twist on the classic Negroni, featuring a lighter and more botanical flavor profile.

White Russian.name: White Russian
White Russian.instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add vodka and coffee liqueur. Float heavy cream on top and stir gently to combine.
White Russian.personal_notes: A rich and creamy cocktail popularized by 'The Big Lebowski,' offering a dessert-like experience.

Dry Martini.name: Dry Martini
Dry Martini.instructions: Combine gin, dry vermouth, and orange bitters (if using) in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.
Dry Martini.personal_notes: A timeless classic, epitomizing elegance and simplicity in the cocktail world.

Fitzgerald.name: Fitzgerald
Fitzgerald.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Fitzgerald.instructions: Combine gin, fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, and Angostura bitters in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.
Fitzgerald.personal_notes: A modern classic created by bartender Dale DeGroff, offering a balanced and refreshing gin sour with a hint of spice.

Hand Grenade.name: Hand Grenade
Hand Grenade.made_from: Vodka, Gin, White Rum, Melon Liqueur, Pineapple Juice
Hand Grenade.instructions: Combine vodka, gin, white rum, melon liqueur, and pineapple juice in a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously until well-chilled. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime or a cherry, if desired.
Hand Grenade.personal_notes: A potent and sweet cocktail popular in New Orleans, known for its bright green color and fruity flavor.

Blood & Sand.name: Blood & Sand
Blood & Sand.made_from: Scotch Whisky, Sweet Vermouth, Cherry Heering, Orange Juice
Blood & Sand.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Blood & Sand.personal_notes: A classic cocktail from the 1920s, named after the Rudolph Valentino film, offering a balanced blend of smoky, sweet, and citrus flavors.

Milano Torino (Mi-To).name: Milano Torino (Mi-To)
Milano Torino (Mi-To).instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add Campari and sweet vermouth. Stir gently to combine. Top with a splash of soda water, if desired. Garnish with an orange slice.
Milano Torino (Mi-To).personal_notes: An Italian aperitif cocktail that is the precursor to the Americano and Negroni, known for its bitter and sweet flavor profile.

Blue Lagoon.name: Blue Lagoon
Blue Lagoon.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and blue curaçao. Top with lemonade. Stir gently to combine. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.
Blue Lagoon.personal_notes: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail with a striking blue color and a sweet citrus flavor.

Division Bell.name: Division Bell
Division Bell.made_from: Mezcal, Aperol, Maraschino Liqueur, Lime Juice
Division Bell.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Division Bell.personal_notes: A modern cocktail that offers a smoky, bitter, and citrusy flavor profile, created by bartender Phil Ward in 2009.

Gin & Tonic.name: Gin & Tonic
Gin & Tonic.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add gin. Top with tonic water. Stir gently to combine. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Gin & Tonic.personal_notes: A classic and refreshing highball cocktail that is simple to make and widely enjoyed.

La Louisiane.name: La Louisiane
La Louisiane.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Sweet Vermouth, Bénédictine, Absinthe, Peychaud's Bitters
La Louisiane.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
La Louisiane.personal_notes: A classic New Orleans cocktail that is a cross between a Manhattan and a Sazerac, offering a rich and complex flavor profile.

Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall.name: Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall
Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall.made_from: Vodka, Southern Comfort, Orange Juice, Sloe Gin, Galliano
Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall.instructions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine vodka, Southern Comfort, and orange juice. Shake well and pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Drizzle the sloe gin on top and let it bleed into the drink, then float the Galliano as the final layer. Garnish with an orange slice.
Slow Comfortable Screw Against The Wall.personal_notes: A layered cocktail from the 1980s, combining fruity and herbal flavors with a sweet finish.

Penicillin.name: Penicillin
Penicillin.made_from: Blended Scotch Whisky, Lemon Juice, Honey-Ginger Syrup, Islay Single Malt Scotch
Penicillin.instructions: Combine blended Scotch, lemon juice, and honey-ginger syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Float the Islay single malt Scotch on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.
Penicillin.personal_notes: A modern classic cocktail with a balance of smoky, sweet, and spicy flavors.

Mexican Mule.name: Mexican Mule
Mexican Mule.instructions: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice. Add tequila and lime juice. Top with ginger beer and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Mexican Mule.personal_notes: A spicy and refreshing cocktail, a tequila-based twist on the classic Moscow Mule.

Rum Sour.name: Rum Sour
Rum Sour.made_from: Aged Rum, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup, Orange Juice, Angostura Bitters
Rum Sour.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Rum Sour.personal_notes: A balanced and citrusy cocktail that highlights the rich flavors of aged rum.

Dark 'n' Stormy.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
Dark 'n' Stormy.made_from: Dark Rum, Ginger Beer, Lime Juice
Dark 'n' Stormy.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add ginger beer and lime juice (if using). Float the dark rum on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Dark 'n' Stormy.personal_notes: A classic Bermudian cocktail with a spicy and robust flavor profile.

Breakfast Martini.name: Breakfast Martini
Breakfast Martini.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Triple Sec, Orange Marmalade
Breakfast Martini.instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice, triple sec, and orange marmalade in a shaker without ice. Dry shake to dissolve the marmalade. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Breakfast Martini.personal_notes: A modern cocktail that brings breakfast flavors into a delightful and zesty drink.

Red Hook.name: Red Hook
Red Hook.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Punt e Mes, Maraschino Liqueur
Red Hook.instructions: Combine rye whiskey, Punt e Mes, and maraschino liqueur in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a lemon twist.
Red Hook.personal_notes: A modern variation of the Manhattan, named after the Brooklyn neighborhood, offering a balanced blend of sweetness and bitterness.

Maple Old-Fashioned.name: Maple Old-Fashioned
Maple Old-Fashioned.made_from: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey, Maple Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Maple Old-Fashioned.instructions: In a mixing glass, combine whiskey, maple syrup, and bitters. Add ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Express the oil from an orange twist over the drink and drop it into the glass.
Maple Old-Fashioned.personal_notes: A seasonal twist on the classic Old-Fashioned, using maple syrup as the sweetener to add a rich, earthy sweetness.

Army & Navy.name: Army & Navy
Army & Navy.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Orgeat Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Army & Navy.instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice, orgeat syrup, and bitters in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Army & Navy.personal_notes: A classic cocktail from the 1940s, offering a balanced blend of gin's botanicals, citrus, and the nutty sweetness of orgeat.

Vieux Carré.name: Vieux Carré
Vieux Carré.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Cognac, Sweet Vermouth, Bénédictine, Peychaud's Bitters, Angostura Bitters
Vieux Carré.instructions: Combine rye whiskey, cognac, sweet vermouth, Bénédictine, and both bitters in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Vieux Carré.personal_notes: A classic New Orleans cocktail named after the French Quarter, offering a complex and rich flavor profile.

Enzoni.name: Enzoni
Enzoni.made_from: Gin, Campari, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Green Grapes
Enzoni.instructions: Muddle the grapes in a shaker. Add gin, Campari, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Fill with ice and shake well until chilled. Double strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Enzoni.personal_notes: A modern cocktail that balances the bitterness of Campari with the sweetness of grapes and tartness of lemon.

Ramos Gin Fizz.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Ramos Gin Fizz.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup, Heavy Cream, Egg White, Orange Flower Water, Vanilla Extract, Soda Water
Ramos Gin Fizz.instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, heavy cream, egg white, orange flower water, and vanilla extract in a shaker without ice. Dry shake vigorously for about 30 seconds to emulsify. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled Collins glass without ice. Slowly top with soda water to create a frothy head that rises above the rim of the glass. No garnish.
Ramos Gin Fizz.personal_notes: A classic New Orleans cocktail known for its frothy texture and citrusy, creamy flavor. Requires extensive shaking to achieve the desired foam.

Old Cuban.name: Old Cuban
Old Cuban.made_from: Aged Rum, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup, Mint Leaves, Angostura Bitters, Champagne
Old Cuban.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a shaker. Add rum, lime juice, and bitters. Fill with ice and shake well until chilled. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Top with champagne. Garnish with a mint leaf.
Old Cuban.personal_notes: A sophisticated cocktail that combines the richness of aged rum with the effervescence of champagne, balanced by fresh mint and lime.

Man O' War.name: Man O' War
Man O' War.made_from: Bourbon, Orange Curaçao, Sweet Vermouth, Lemon Juice
Man O' War.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or a cherry.
Man O' War.personal_notes: Named after the famous racehorse, this cocktail offers a harmonious blend of bourbon's warmth with citrus and sweet vermouth's complexity.

Screaming Orgasm.name: Screaming Orgasm
Screaming Orgasm.made_from: Vodka, Coffee Liqueur, Amaretto, Irish Cream Liqueur, Half-and-Half Cream
Screaming Orgasm.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. No garnish.
Screaming Orgasm.personal_notes: A rich and creamy cocktail with a sweet, nutty flavor profile, popular as a dessert drink.

Left Bank Martini.name: Left Bank Martini
Left Bank Martini.made_from: Gin, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, Dry White Wine
Left Bank Martini.instructions: Combine gin, St-Germain, and white wine in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Left Bank Martini.personal_notes: A floral and aromatic martini variation that balances the botanicals of gin with the sweetness of elderflower and the crispness of white wine.

Casino.name: Casino
Casino.made_from: Old Tom Gin, Maraschino Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Orange Bitters
Casino.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.
Casino.personal_notes: A classic gin cocktail from the early 20th century, offering a balanced mix of sweetness, citrus, and herbal notes.

Black Manhattan.name: Black Manhattan
Black Manhattan.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Amaro Averna, Angostura Bitters, Orange Bitters
Black Manhattan.instructions: Combine rye whiskey, Amaro Averna, and both bitters in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry.
Black Manhattan.personal_notes: A modern twist on the classic Manhattan, substituting sweet vermouth with Amaro Averna for a richer, more complex flavor.

Air Mail.name: Air Mail
Air Mail.made_from: Aged Rum, Lime Juice, Honey Syrup, Champagne
Air Mail.instructions: Combine rum, lime juice, and honey syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lime twist.
Air Mail.personal_notes: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail that balances the richness of aged rum with the brightness of lime and the sweetness of honey.

Nuclear Daiquiri.name: Nuclear Daiquiri
Nuclear Daiquiri.made_from: Overproof White Rum, Green Chartreuse, Lime Juice, Falernum
Nuclear Daiquiri.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.
Nuclear Daiquiri.personal_notes: A potent and herbal variation of the classic Daiquiri, featuring the bold flavors of Green Chartreuse and overproof rum.

M & M.name: M & M
M & M.made_from: Bourbon, Amaro Montenegro, Maraschino Liqueur, Angostura Bitters
M & M.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
M & M.personal_notes: A balanced cocktail that combines the sweetness of Maraschino liqueur with the herbal complexity of Amaro Montenegro.

Final Ward.name: Final Ward
Final Ward.made_from: Rye Whiskey, Green Chartreuse, Maraschino Liqueur, Lemon Juice
Final Ward.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.
Final Ward.personal_notes: A riff on the classic Last Word cocktail, substituting gin with rye whiskey and lime juice with lemon juice for a richer flavor.

Picante de la Casa.name: Picante de la Casa
Picante de la Casa.made_from: Reposado Tequila, Lime Juice, Agave Syrup, Red Chili Pepper, Coriander Leaves
Picante de la Casa.instructions: Muddle chili slices and coriander leaves in a shaker. Add tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup. Fill with ice and shake well until chilled. Double strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a chili slice and a coriander leaf.
Picante de la Casa.personal_notes: A spicy and flavorful cocktail that combines the heat of chili peppers with the freshness of coriander and the smoothness of reposado tequila.

Clover Club.name: Clover Club
Clover Club.made_from: Gin, Lemon Juice, Raspberry Syrup, Egg White
Clover Club.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker without ice. Dry shake to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh raspberry.
Clover Club.personal_notes: A pre-Prohibition classic that offers a frothy and fruity experience, with the tartness of lemon balanced by sweet raspberry.

Garibaldi.name: Garibaldi
Garibaldi.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the Campari. In a separate container, vigorously shake the fresh orange juice to aerate it, creating a frothy texture. Pour the frothed orange juice over the Campari. Garnish with an orange wedge.
Garibaldi.personal_notes: A simple yet delightful Italian cocktail that balances the bitterness of Campari with the sweetness of freshly frothed orange juice.

Vodka Sour.name: Vodka Sour
Vodka Sour.made_from: Vodka, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White
Vodka Sour.instructions: Combine vodka, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white (if using) in a shaker without ice. Dry shake to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.
Vodka Sour.personal_notes: A smooth and tangy cocktail, the Vodka Sour is enhanced by the addition of egg white, which provides a silky texture and a frothy top.

Sex on the Beach.name: Sex on the Beach
Sex on the Beach.made_from: Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice
Sex on the Beach.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and peach schnapps. Pour in the cranberry juice and orange juice. Stir gently to combine. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
Sex on the Beach.personal_notes: A fruity and refreshing cocktail that's perfect for summer, combining the flavors of peach, cranberry, and orange.

White Lady.name: White Lady
White Lady.made_from: Gin, Cointreau, Lemon Juice, Egg White
White Lady.instructions: Combine gin, Cointreau, lemon juice, and egg white (if using) in a shaker without ice. Dry shake to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
White Lady.personal_notes: A classic gin-based cocktail with a perfect balance of citrus and sweetness, elevated by a silky texture from the egg white.

Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon-based).name: Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon-based)
Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon-based).made_from: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey, Amaretto, Angostura Bitters
Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon-based).instructions: In a mixing glass, combine bourbon, amaretto, and bitters. Add ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Express the oil from an orange twist over the drink and drop it into the glass.
Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon-based).personal_notes: A nutty twist on the classic Old Fashioned, with amaretto adding a subtle almond flavor that complements the bourbon.

Naked & Famous.name: Naked & Famous
Naked & Famous.made_from: Mezcal, Yellow Chartreuse, Aperol, Lime Juice
Naked & Famous.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.
Naked & Famous.personal_notes: A modern equal-parts cocktail that offers a harmonious blend of smoky, herbal, and citrus flavors.

Fancy Free.name: Fancy Free
Fancy Free.made_from: Bourbon, Maraschino Liqueur, Angostura Bitters, Orange Bitters
Fancy Free.instructions: Place a large ice cube in an old fashioned glass. Add bourbon, maraschino liqueur, Angostura bitters, and orange bitters. Stir until chilled, about 15 seconds. Garnish with an orange twist.
Fancy Free.personal_notes: A delightful variation of the Old Fashioned, with maraschino liqueur adding a subtle cherry sweetness that complements the bourbon.

Champs-Élysées.name: Champs-Élysées
Champs-Élysées.made_from: Cognac, Green Chartreuse, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Champs-Élysées.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Champs-Élysées.personal_notes: A classic French cocktail that offers a harmonious blend of herbal, citrus, and spirituous flavors.

Jammie Dodger.name: Jammie Dodger
Jammie Dodger.instructions: Moisten the rim of a shot glass and dip it in sugar to coat. Pour the raspberry liqueur into the glass. Using the back of a spoon, carefully float the double cream on top of the liqueur. Serve immediately.
Jammie Dodger.personal_notes: A sweet and creamy shooter inspired by the popular British biscuit, offering a delightful blend of raspberry and cream flavors.

Cantaritos.name: Cantaritos
Cantaritos.made_from: Tequila, Orange Juice, Grapefruit Juice, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup, Salt, Soda Water
Cantaritos.instructions: In a clay mug or highball glass filled with ice, combine tequila, orange juice, grapefruit juice, lime juice, simple syrup, and a pinch of salt. Stir to mix. Top with soda water. Garnish with a citrus wedge.
Cantaritos.personal_notes: A refreshing Mexican cocktail that combines citrus juices with tequila, traditionally served in clay mugs called 'cantaritos'.

Appletini (Sour Apple Martini).name: Appletini (Sour Apple Martini)
Appletini (Sour Apple Martini).made_from: Vodka, Sour Apple Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup
Appletini (Sour Apple Martini).instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice.
Appletini (Sour Apple Martini).personal_notes: A vibrant and tangy cocktail that became popular in the late 1990s, known for its bright green hue and tart apple flavor.

Trinidad Sour.name: Trinidad Sour
Trinidad Sour.made_from: Angostura Bitters, Orgeat Syrup, Rye Whiskey, Lemon Juice
Trinidad Sour.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.
Trinidad Sour.personal_notes: A unique cocktail that uses Angostura Bitters as a base, resulting in a complex and aromatic drink with a distinctive reddish hue.

Gin & It.name: Gin & It
Gin & It.instructions: Combine gin and sweet vermouth in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Gin & It.personal_notes: A simple yet elegant cocktail that pairs the botanicals of gin with the sweetness of vermouth, believed to be a precursor to the Martini.

San Francisco.name: San Francisco
San Francisco.made_from: Vodka, Crème de Banane, Orange Juice, Pineapple Juice
San Francisco.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.
San Francisco.personal_notes: A fruity and tropical cocktail that combines the smoothness of vodka with the sweetness of banana liqueur and citrus juices.
